sentences.english: Well-sorted quartz sandstones are generally not very abundant.
sentences.chinese: 分選良好的石英沙岩一般並不十分豐富。

sentences.english: The blue sandstone face contrast the stainless steel filigree and case.
sentences.chinese: 藍色沙岩表面與不鏽鋼花邊和錶殼對比感強烈。

sentences.english: A bluish-gray sandstone used for paving and building.
sentences.chinese: 青石，藍砂岩一種藍灰色的沙岩，用於。

sentences.english: They found a bed of sandstone.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現了一個沙岩石牀。

sentences.english: The sandstone fa?ade had disintegrated from long exposure to the elements.
sentences.chinese: 由於長期暴露在自然環境中，沙岩的表面已經風化了。

sentences.english: The sandstone façade had disintegrated from long exposure to the elements.
sentences.chinese: 由於長期暴露在自然環境中，沙岩的表面已經風化了。

sentences.english: Is the sand-stone terrain, the BTM machinery all with difficulty opens cutting.
sentences.chinese: 雪山隧道是四稜沙岩地形，BTM機械都難以開鑿。

sentences.english: The building rests on a platform of red sandstone.
sentences.chinese: 這座建築挺立在一塊紅色沙岩的平臺上。

definition: rhyolite (extrusive igneous rock, chemically equivalent to granite)
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
